rules_text:
Flying
Protection from creatures with flying.
When this creature enters, create a implant token with a flying counter. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]

Redbay’s Feedback:
I think unlike (The white vigilance one), this one actually works, since you can grant the falconer flying and then it's basically unblockable, and you get to have another flying implant for another creature or maybe to nullify a reach blocker.
